title: Herbal Detox Tea — Pitta-Cleansing Blend
excerpt: A cooling tea blend of coriander, fennel, mint, rose petals and a touch of licorice to calm excess Pitta and support liver and digestion.
content:
## What Is This Pitta-Cleansing Tea?
A gentle, cooling herbal tea formulated for times of excess Pitta—hot weather, spicy foods, or emotional irritability. It combines coriander, fennel, mint, rose petals, and a small amount of licorice for balance.

## Ayurvedic Significance
This tea is designed to cool internal heat, support liver function, and aid digestion—qualities central to managing Pitta imbalances.

### Key Benefits
- Alleviates excess heat and acidity.
- Supports liver and digestive comfort.
- Refreshes mind and digestion in warm seasons.

## Ingredients
- Coriander
- Fennel
- Mint
- Rose petals
- Licorice (small amount)

## Usage Instructions
- Steep 1 tea sachet in hot water for 5–7 minutes.
- Drink 2–3 cups daily when Pitta is elevated.

## Packaging
- Compostable tea sachets in a recyclable box.

## Safety & Consultation
- Licorice should be used moderately (avoid long-term high doses if hypertensive). Consult your practitioner if pregnant or on medications.

## Why Choose This Blend?
A refreshing, seasonally appropriate tea to cool, calm, and support digestion while respecting Ayurvedic dosing principles.
